price: Lalle kũ ne kuka fi bãyar da firgita a cikin zukãtansu bisa ga Allah, wannan kuwa dõmin sũ lalle waɗansu irin mutãne ne da bã su gãnẽwa.
arabic: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fī ṣudūrihim mina al-lahi dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
